remarks: If ` G ` is a section of ` F ` and ` F ` is a section of ` H ` , then ` G = H ` .  Proposition 3.10 of [Adamek] p. 28.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
sectcan.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
sectcan.s $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
sectcan.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
sectcan.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
sectcan.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
sectcan.1 $e |- ( ph -> G ( X S Y ) F ) $.
sectcan.2 $e |- ( ph -> F ( Y S X ) H ) $.
sectcan $p |- ( ph -> G = H ) $.
